>
[Genie Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2550) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ardande" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=498" />
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
<trait label="Oread" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=304" />
<trait label="Suli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=310" />
<trait label="Sylph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=311" />
<trait label="Talos" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=507" />
<trait label="Undine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=314" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 99 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Genie Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2547)

</column>

---

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in [falchions](/Weapons.aspx?ID=18), [ranseurs](/Weapons.aspx?ID=35), [scimitars](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38), [tridents](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45), and all [geniekin](/Traits.aspx?ID=340) weapons in which you are trained.
name: Genie Weapon Expertise
